items.sentence: Wearing glasses makes you look more intellectual.
Were you aware Tom was having financial problems?
My father can speak French, but my mother can\'t.
Tom wants to have nothing further to do with you.
Tom wants to know where Mary went to high school.
Tom wants to meet with you to discuss the matter.
I don\'t understand what you\'re asking me to do.
Tom was about to be shot, but he didn\'t know it.
After reading Tom\'s letter, Mary started crying.
Tom knew there wasn\'t much he could do about it.
